please_connect_your_wallet: Please connect your wallet to utilize this feature

explain.available: IC is activated but has not yet reached other milestones
explain.claim_waiting: IC reaches P-Claim but waiting to receive Q-Claim at T-End
explain.claimed: IC has received Q-Claim at T-End
explain.refunded: P-Market is between P-Refunded and P-Claim at T-End, Margin is refunded
explain.liquidated: P-Market reaches P-Expired, IC is terminated immediately
explain.expired: At T-End, P-Market is not in the claim waiting, claimed, refunded, liquidated

installer.metamask_content: Please add Metamask Extension to continue the wallet connection process with Nami Insurance.
installer.metamask_guide: Having trouble installing the wallet? Read more how to Install Metamask Extension now.
installer.coinbase_content: Vui lòng cài đặt Coinbase Wallet Extension để tiếp tục quá trình kết nối ví đến Nami Insurance.
installer.coinbase_guide: Chưa biết cách cài đặt ví? Đọc Hướng dẫn cài đặt Coinbase Wallet Extension ngay.

error_switch_network: Connection failed! Please switch network to connect wallet.

switch_network.title: Check your network
switch_network.description: Nami Insurance is currently only supported on BNB Smart Chain. Change the network in your wallet in order to continue using the product.

not_found_network.title: Your wallet does not currently have BNB Smart Chain.
not_found_network.description: Please click 'Add BNB Smart Chain' and copy the following information

dont_have_wallet: Don't yet have a Wallet Extension? Explore How to add a wallet now
user_not_login: User is not currently logged in. Please enter the user's password at the Wallet application.

modal.dont_show_later: Không hiện lại thông báo này

email_subscription.ignore_description: Skip and update later by clicking"Update Email" at My Wallet
email_subscription.description: Enter Email to get latest about your Insurance Contract status

contact.title: Contact Nami Insurance
contact.description: We are pleased to receive your request.
contact.send_success_desc: We will respond within 2-3 working days. Please check your mail box regularly
